titles: Christ inviting sinners to come to him for rest by Jeremiah Burroughes.
author: Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.
notes: "Wherein is shewed, first: 1. The burden of sin, 2. The burden of the law, 3. The burden of legal performances ..., 4. The burden of corruption, 5. The burden of outward affliction. Secondly, Christ graciously offers ... rest from all those burdens .... Thirdly, there is shewed: 1. The rest believers have from sin, 2. The deliverance from the law by Christ ..., 3. The rest believers have from the burden ... 4. How Christ gives rest from the burden of corruption ..., 6. How Christ gives rest from outward afflictions, 7. Some directions how to get rest from Christ in Spiritual desertions."
